tools.name: Framing Hammer
tools.useDescription: For heavy wood construction and concrete framework

tools.name: Circular Saw
tools.useDescription: Powered hand-saw for ripping or cross-cutting materials in a straight line

tools.name: Cordless Drill
tools.useDescription: For drilling round holes or driving fasteners

tools.name: Miter Saw
tools.useDescription: For making cross-cuts at a variety of angles

tools.name: Hammer Drill
tools.useDescription: For drilling in hard materials like stone, brickwork, or concrete

tools.name: Air Compressor
tools.useDescription: Powers air-tools like impact wrenches, nail guns, air-chisels, etc.
